topic.title: Adverse Reaction Reporting Event - conformance rules

section.p: When adverse event or suspected event is originally reported to a caregiver. Adverse Event: Any incident where the use of a medication (drug or biologic), at any dose, a medical device (including in vitro diagnostics) or a special nutritional product (e.g., dietary supplement, infant formula or medical food) is suspected to have resulted in an adverse outcome in a patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
"A unique identifier for the Act." (HL7 3.0)

Contains exactly one [1..1] comments with data type String
Any comments or notes made in reference to the adverse event or suspected event.
Contains exactly one [1..1] congenitalAnomaly with data type Boolean

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateReported with data type Point In Time
Date when the adverse reaction or suspected reaction reported.
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateDoctorNotified with data type Date
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateReportedToFda with data type Date
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateReportedToMfr with data type Date
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateReportedToVaers with data type Date
Contains exactly one [1..1] daysHospitalized with data type Integer
Contains exactly one [1..1] didPatientDieFromEvent with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] didPatientRecover with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] eventDate with data type Date

Contains exactly one [1..1] isReporterACareProvider with data type Boolean
If the person reporting the Adverse Event is a Health Care Provider? Possible Values Include: Yes, No etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] otherRelatedHistory with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] patientConsentDate with data type Date
Contains exactly one [1..1] requiredErOrMdVisit with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] requiredHospitalization with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] resultedInPermanentDisability with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] resultedInProlongedHospitalization with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] requiredIntervention with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] sendToFda with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] sendToMfr with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] severity with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasDiscloseIdToMfr with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasDoseRelated with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasEventLifeThreatening with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasReactionTreatedWithRx with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasRelatedToNewDrug with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasRelatedToTherapeuticFailure with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasSeriousADR with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] wasUnexpectedADR with data type Boolean
Contains zero or more [0..*] concommittantDrugs, where its type is Concommittant Drugs

Contains zero or more [0..*] intoleranceObservation, where its type is Intolerance Condition
Related reactions for the event.
Contains zero or more [0..*] relevantLabData, where its type is Relevant Lab Data
Contains zero or more [0..*] suspectedAgent, where its type is Suspected Agent
Contains exactly one [1..1] witness, where its type is Individual Provider

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
"A unique identifier for the Act." (HL7 3.0)

Contains exactly one [1..1] comments with data type String
Any comments or notes made in reference to the adverse event or suspected event.
Contains exactly one [1..1] congenitalAnomaly with data type Boolean

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateReported with data type Point In Time
Date when the adverse reaction or suspected reaction reported.
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateDoctorNotified with data type Date
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateReportedToFda with data type Date
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateReportedToMfr with data type Date
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateReportedToVaers with data type Date

Contains exactly one [1..1] didPatientRecover with data type Boolean
Contains exactly one [1..1] eventDate with data type Date

If the person reporting the Adverse Event is a Health Care Provider? Possible Values Include: Yes, No etc.
